result.arabic_text: سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمِنۡ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: Nihaninahazwe rero Imana Allah Yaremye amoko yose y’ibiterwa n’ivyimeza kw’isi, Ikarema igitsina-gabo n’igitsina-gore no mu bantu nyene, no mu bindi biremwa rero batazi[6].
result.footnotes: [6] Imana Allah rero, Yaremye ivyo vyose ata we Yifashishije, ntikwiye kubangikanywa na kimwe mu biremwa vyayo mu gusengwa.
